page.title: 19HOUSING IN SKEGNESS.
page.content: In our block there seem to be two very different areas of housing.That is a large Council Estate and then private housing. The Council Estate is in the Tennyson Green/Sandbeck Avenue area.It was built around 1940..that is straight after the second world war.The people who live in Council houses pay a rent to the{Skegness Town Council.}This is a subsidised rent which also includes rates and land drainage rates.Recently national laws have been passed which allow council tenants to buy their houses at a favourable rate. The private housing in our area is made up of many different styles, though much of it is bungalow development. While there are some bungalow estates which were built in the late 1960's much of it is older and developed without any overall plan
